thread.title: Kyle
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Kyle

author: Kyle
title: Kyle
text: Everyone was very nice and knowledgeable, picked out the perfect tire for my commute. Definitely going back when I need new tires. They are very friendly and they explain in depth about the tire. And what they think is the best fit for you. For sure I'm recommending this place to my friends and family.
